content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 25), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ゲーム開始。敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍のランダム位置にいる。私の空母は右下(28,25)にいるため、敵空母との距離は約25ヘクス程度。航空部隊の航続距離は22ヘクスなので、現在位置からでは敵空母に届かない可能性が高い。まず敵空母の大まかな位置を把握するため、左上方向に索敵を行う必要がある。BSQ1を(10,10)付近に発艦させて索敵を開始し、同時に空母を北西方向に移動させて敵空母に近づく。敵空母を先に発見することが勝利の鍵となる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 15}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=10 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=13 y=12.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航空部隊の航続距離22ヘクスの制約を見落としていた。現在位置(28,25)から距離22以内で敵空母がいる可能性が高い左上方向を索敵する必要がある。(28,25)から距離22以内で最も左上に近い座標を計算すると、(13,12)あたりが適切。まずBSQ1を(13,12)に発艦させて索敵を開始し、空母も北西方向に移動して次のターンでより遠方を索敵できるようにする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 15}, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 12}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (13, 12) while at (27, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 23), en route to target (20, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (27, 22), outbound toward (13, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が(13,12)に向かって移動中。空母も(20,15)に向かって移動中。BSQ1は目標地点に到達するまで数ターンかかるが、移動経路で敵空母を発見する可能性がある。現在の索敵範囲では敵を発見していない。BSQ2も発艦させて別の方向を索敵すべき。敵空母は(3,3)近傍にいるので、より北方向や西方向も索敵する必要がある。BSQ2を(10,5)方向に発艦させて北西方向の索敵を強化する。空母は引き続き北西に移動して索敵範囲を拡大する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 5}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=5 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=13 y=7.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "再び航続距離の制約に引っかかった。現在空母は(27,23)にいるので、距離22以内で北西方向を索敵するには(13,7)が適切。BSQ1は(13,12)に向かっているので、BSQ2は(13,7)に発艦させて北方向の索敵を強化する。これで敵空母がいる可能性が高い左上エリアを2方向から索敵できる。空母は引き続き(20,15)に向かって移動し、次のターンでより遠方を索敵できるようにする。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 7}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (13, 7) while at (26, 20).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 21), en route to target (20, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (24, 19), outbound toward (13, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (26, 20), outbound toward (13, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が索敵に向かっている。BSQ1は(13,12)へ、BSQ2は(13,7)へ向かっており、敵空母がいる可能性が高い左上エリアを2方向から索敵中。まだ敵を発見していない。空母は(20,15)に向かって移動中で、次のターンには到着予定。到着後はより遠方への索敵が可能になる。現在は両航空部隊の索敵結果を待つ段階。空母の移動は継続し、新たな発艦指示は不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 19), en route to target (20, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 17), outbound toward (13, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (24, 16), outbound toward (13, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が目標に向かって順調に進んでいる。BSQ1は(13,12)まであと数ヘクス、BSQ2は(13,7)に向かっている。まだ敵空母を発見していない。空母は(20,15)に向かって移動中で、もうすぐ到着する。現在の索敵で敵を発見できなければ、空母がより北西に移動して次の索敵範囲を拡大する必要がある。両航空部隊の索敵結果を待つ段階で、現在は行動変更の必要なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 17), en route to target (20, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 16), outbound toward (13, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 12), outbound toward (13, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が目標地点に近づいている。BSQ1は(13,12)まであと5ヘクス程度、BSQ2は(13,7)に向かって進んでいる。まだ敵空母を発見していない。空母は(20,15)にもうすぐ到着する。現在の索敵範囲では敵を発見できていないため、敵空母はより北西の位置、おそらく(3,3)により近い位置にいる可能性が高い。両航空部隊が目標地点に到達して索敵を完了するまで待機し、その結果を見て次の作戦を立てる必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 19) while at (15, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 19) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 16), en route to target (20, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 14), outbound toward (13, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 11), outbound toward (13, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な発見！BSQ1が敵航空部隊ASQ1を(15,19)で発見した。敵機は(14,18)から(15,19)に移動しているので南東方向に向かっている。これは敵機が我が空母を索敵している可能性が高い。敵空母の位置はまだ不明だが、敵機の移動方向から敵空母は北西方向にある可能性が高い。敵機が我が空母の位置を発見する前に、敵空母を発見する必要がある。BSQ1とBSQ2は引き続き目標地点に向かわせ、空母は敵機から離れるため南方向に移動を変更する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 20}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (7, 13) while at (11, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 19) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 18), en route to target (20, 20), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 13), outbound toward (7, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 9), outbound toward (13, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "素晴らしい！BSQ1が敵空母AC1を(7,13)で発見した。敵空母は(9,13)から(7,13)に移動しているので西方向に移動中。BSQ1は自動的に敵空母への攻撃に向かっている。これで先制攻撃のチャンスを得た。BSQ2も(13,7)に向かっているが、敵空母の位置が判明したので、BSQ2も敵空母(7,13)への攻撃に向かわせるべき。2機で波状攻撃を行えば敵空母撃沈の可能性が高まる。空母は敵機ASQ1から離れるため南方向への移動を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 13}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "エラーを理解した。BSQ2は既に発艦済みで目標(13,7)に向かっているため、新たな指示を出すことはできない。BSQ1は敵空母を発見して自動的に攻撃に向かっている。BSQ2は(13,7)に到達後、敵空母を発見できなければ帰還する。現在できることは空母の移動のみ。敵航空部隊ASQ1が我が空母を索敵している可能性があるため、空母は敵機から離れる方向に移動を継続する。BSQ1の攻撃結果を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (21, 19) while at (21, 20).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 21) while at (21, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 13) while at (7, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (13, 7).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (5, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (21, 19) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (19, 21) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 20), en route to target (20, 20), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 13), outbound toward (5, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 7), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "危険な状況！我が空母が敵航空部隊ASQ1(21,19)とASQ2(19,21)を発見した。敵機2機が我が空母の近くにいる。BSQ1は敵空母AC1(5,13)への攻撃に向かっているが、敵空母は西に移動を続けている。BSQ2は(13,7)から帰還中。敵機2機が我が空母を攻撃してくる可能性が非常に高い。空母を緊急に南東方向に移動させて敵機から逃れる必要がある。BSQ1の攻撃が成功することを祈りつつ、空母の生存を最優先にする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 25}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (21, 20).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 21 damage while at (21, 20).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 19) while at (21, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (4, 12) while at (4, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (4, 12) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (21, 19) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 22/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 19) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 20), en route to target (25, 25), HP 79/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (4, 13), engaging an enemy target at (4, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "激しい戦闘が始まった！我が空母が敵航空部隊ASQ1に対空攻撃を行い21ダメージを与えた（敵HP22/40）。しかし我が空母もダメージを受けてHP79/100になった。BSQ1は敵空母AC1(4,12)と交戦中で、これが勝負の分かれ目。敵航空部隊ASQ2(20,19)も近くにいて危険。空母は(25,25)に向かって逃走中。BSQ2は帰還中。BSQ1の攻撃が成功すれば勝利、失敗すれば敵の波状攻撃で劣勢になる可能性が高い。空母の逃走を継続し、BSQ1の戦果に期待する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (21, 20).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 27 damage while at (21, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 23 damage while at (4, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (4, 13).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 18) while at (21, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 18) while at (17, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 19) while at (17, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (4, 12) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 76/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 18) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 22/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 19) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 20), en route to target (25, 25), HP 52/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (4, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "戦況が激化している！BSQ1が敵空母AC1に23ダメージを与えて敵空母HP76/100にした。しかしBSQ1もダメージを受けてHP17/40になり帰還中。我が空母は敵航空部隊ASQ2に27ダメージを与えたが、自身もHP52/100まで減少。敵航空部隊2機（ASQ1:HP22/40、ASQ2:HP27/40）はまだ脅威。BSQ2は無傷で帰還中。敵空母は生存しているため、まだ勝負は決まっていない。空母は(25,25)への逃走を継続し、両航空部隊の帰還を待つ。帰還後に再攻撃を検討する必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 19) while at (21, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (3, 13) while at (7, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 18) while at (19, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 19) while at (19, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 76/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 18) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 22/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (16, 19) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 22), en route to target (25, 25), HP 52/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (8, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母AC1は(3,13)で西に移動を続けており、HP76/100で生存中。敵航空部隊2機（ASQ1:HP22/40、ASQ2:HP27/40）は損傷しているが依然として脅威。BSQ1(HP17/40)とBSQ2(HP40/40)が帰還中。我が空母はHP52/100で(25,25)に向かって逃走中。BSQ2が先に帰還する予定で、その後再発艦させて敵空母への第二波攻撃を行う必要がある。空母の逃走を継続し、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 19) while at (20, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 18) while at (11, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 19) while at (11, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 76/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (10, 18) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 22/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 19) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 23), en route to target (25, 25), HP 52/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 22), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が空母の近くまで帰還してきた(22,22)。敵航空部隊2機は西方向に移動しており、我が空母から離れつつある。敵空母AC1は(3,13)で生存中(HP76/100)。BSQ2は次のターンに着艦できそうで、その後すぐに敵空母への第二波攻撃に発艦させる必要がある。BSQ1はまだ帰還途中。空母は(25,25)への移動を継続し、BSQ2の着艦と再発艦の準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (8, 17) while at (13, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (24, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (9, 17) while at (14, 18).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 76/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (8, 17) (previously at (14, 18)), HP 22/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (9, 17) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 24), en route to target (25, 25), HP 52/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が着艦完了！敵空母AC1は(3,13)でHP76/100で生存中。敵航空部隊2機は西方向に移動しており我が空母から離れている。今がチャンス！BSQ2を即座に敵空母(3,13)に向けて発艦させ、第二波攻撃を行う。現在空母は(24,24)にいるので、敵空母(3,13)までの距離は約22ヘクス程度で航続距離内。BSQ1はまだ帰還中だが、BSQ2の攻撃で敵空母を撃沈できれば勝利となる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 13}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=3 y=13 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=6 y=15.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航続距離の制約で(3,13)は届かない。現在空母は(24,24)にいるので、距離22以内で敵空母に最も近い座標を指定する必要がある。推奨された(6,15)は敵空母(3,13)に近く、BSQ2が到達後に敵空母を発見して攻撃に移る可能性が高い。BSQ2を(6,15)に発艦させて第二波攻撃を実行する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 6, "y": 15}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (6, 15) while at (24, 25).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (3, 13) (previously at (9, 13)), HP 76/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (9, 17) (previously at (18, 21)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 25), en route to target (25, 25), HP 52/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 17/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (24, 25), outbound toward (6, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
